column4: is it possible for someone to help me with something here? how to i find the root account. i want to enable it so that i can access my desktop and run guis as root.
there is no default root accoung. and direct logging in to x as root is also locked down.
yes it does make sence.  'for security' reaspns
thers no need to use direct logging in as root. i do all that with sudo and gksudo
